snippet: Rafael Nadal beat Stan Wawrinka, 6-1, 6-4, to reach the semifinals of the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco, where he will face Andy Murray....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat Stan Wawrinka, 6-1, 6-4, to reach the semifinals of the Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco, where he will face Andy Murray.
abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Stan Wawrinka and Andy Murray beats Milos Raonic to reach semifinals of Monte Carlo Masters; other tennis news noted.
